DOC.brief_summary: Dermabrasion historical standard use resurface scar skin . Recently , fractionate laser therapy FDA approve scar resurface . This study intend compare dermabrasion versus fractionate laser therapy scar resurfacing .
DOC.brief_title: Laser Resurfacing Versus Dermabrasion Scar Revision
